creator: IceCreamMan@aft3rsh0ck.org
text:
When the Apache service has been started and I want to stop it, it refuses to do so. The services 
manager keeps saying the process is "stopping" and after a 3 minutes or so my computer locks 
up giving me a blue screen saying "process has locked page". This happened 3 times.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7932 ***
creator: wrowe@apache.org
